description:
Ireland, 1952. Philomena Lee (Judi Dench) is a young man who has a newborn son when he is sent to a convent. Unable to take the child, she gives it up for adoption. The child is adopted by an American couple and some in the world. After leaving the convent, Philomena begins a search for his son, along with the help of Martin Sixsmith (Steve Coogan), a journalist with a strong temperament. When traveling to the United States, they discover amazing information about the life of the son of Philomena and create a strong bond of affection between the two.
